rawData.description: Plan Your Dream Trip with Notion!Do you love traveling but hate the hassle of planning your trips? Do you wish you had a simple and elegant way to organize your travel plans, expenses, documents, and more? faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template is fully customizable. You can modify categories, add custom fields, change the layout, and adapt it to your specific travel planning style and preferences.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with any Notion account including the free version. Notion AI features are optional and not required for core functionality.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Setup is straightforward and beginner-friendly. Simply duplicate the template to your Notion workspace and start adding your trip information. No technical knowledge required.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: Yes, this template uses current Notion features and database structures that remain compatible with the latest Notion updates and functionality.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The template includes basic usage instructions, and you can reference Notion's help documentation for general platform questions. Community forums are also available for user support.
